Package miml.core

Interface IConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseMIMLReport, BRkNN_MIMLWrapper, DMLkNN_MIMLWrapper, EvaluatorCV, EvaluatorHoldout, IBLR_ML_MIMLWrapper, MIMLBagging, MIMLClassifier, MIMLClassifierToMI, MIMLClassifierToML, MIMLkNN, MIMLReport, MLkNN_MIMLWrapper, MultiLabelKNN_MIMLWrapper
    public interface IConfiguration
    Interface used to indicate that a class can be configured.
